<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If we don&#39;t say anything it implies &#96;.cfi&#95;sections .eh&#95;frame&#96;, so we</span></CodeLine>
